overview: The first cinematographic record of the city of Vitória (ES), made between 1935 and 1938 by Luis González Batán, using a 16 mm German camcorder. In addition to the city, he filmed his family and himself. The video is the result of the montage of this material, made in the late 1990s by his son Ramon (González) Alvarado.
title: Um Belo Dia
